name: Irish Odyssey
description:
This is an Irish Odyssey beginning with the snake trying to get back into Ireland (after St. Patrick expelled them forever). You'll need a drink after that battle so give a good toast at the bar. Then take your partner by the hand and dance the night away at the Ceili. Finally let the Leprechaun guide you over the rainbow and to your pot of gold.

Best played with 1152x720 or larger since that's what we tested.

We made this game on Train Jam and it was the first - but not the last! - game we've ever made.

Controls:

Spacebar to stay afloat

Right and left arrows for navigation

Credits:

Lucy Monahan (LuJam, @SoFetching) - Unity

Deirdre Carney (CurlyWurly, @RealCurlyWurly) - Art and Design

Elie Abraham - Music

Special Thanks to Crabman, Ashraf, Joseph and Melanie

Thanks so much to Everyone on Train Jam who supported and encouraged us the whole way!
